My Portfolio

See how I can help you grow your business.

Sweet's Bakery

Web and mobile site with products gallery and landing page. Also features cart and pay with Paypal functionality. Built using ReactJS, the styled components library, and the Paypal payments API.

WebsiteGithub

River City Flooring

Website used by flooring contractor for marketing and lead generation. Built using CSS3 Animations, pure Javascript/ES6, NodeJS, and MongoDB. I also used the nodeMailer package to create a form for sending estimate inquiries to the company server.

WebsiteGithub

StarFindr Search

Search engine that utilizes the open source NASA API of images to give the user a unique look into the archives of NASAâ€™s media. Built using CSS3, JS, NodeJS and AJAX/Axios for the API interaction.

WebsiteGithub

Alf's Kitchen

I love to cook. I created this website to share my favorite recipes. Built using CSS3, JS, NodeJS and MongoDB. I also used the Passport npm package to allow users to create an account and subscribe to newsletters.

WebsiteGithub
